mapper.select: SELECT department, avg(rate) as avgRate FROM campaign Group by department order by avgRate asc;
SELECT name, businessPeriod, rate from campaign where substring(current_date(),1,4) = SUBSTRING_INDEX(businessPeriod, '~', -1) order by rate asc
SELECT fulfil, count(distinct name) as cnt FROM campaign group by fulfil order by cnt desc
SELECT section, manager, name, fulfil, rate, businessPeriod FROM campaign order by rate,businessPeriod asc
SELECT section, manager, name, fulfil, rate, businessPeriod FROM campaign where department = #{department} order by rate,businessPeriod asc
SELECT department, fulfil, count(distinct name) as cnt FROM campaign where department = #{department} group by fulfil order by rate,businessPeriod asc
SELECT fulfil, count(fulfil) as cnt FROM campaign where department = #{department} group by fulfil order by rate desc
